backend/main.mo: Actor manages website content, user profiles, and access‑controlled updates using AccessControl and a migration mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module resets website content to new defaults during upgrades while preserving other state.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config defining warm color variables and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app with favicon and meta tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, content fetching, layout sections, profile modal, and admin editor.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays a destructive alert indicating lack of admin permissions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEdito: Admin dialog for editing website content with permission checks, form state, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Responsive header with smooth-scroll navigation, login button, and admin-only edit actions for mobile and desktop.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Renders the content section with title, body text, and three feature cards.
Displays footer text, attribution link, and current year branding.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with title, body, CTA button, and illustration image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Returns whether the current authenticated user is an admin along with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and updating website content, user profiles, roles, and admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL and hash params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind setup defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, known issues, and customization goals for the website build.
